    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./joyent_files/style.css">    <script src="./joyent_files/jquery.min.js"></script>    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./joyent_files/footable.core.min.css">    <script src="./joyent_files/bootstrap.min.js"></script>    <script src="./joyent_files/footable.js"></script>    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('pre').each(function() {
                var thepre = $(this);
                if (!thepre.hasClass('ignore')) thepre.addClass('prettyprint');
            });
            $('#toggle-menu').on('touchstart click',menu);
            $('#page').on('touchstart click',function(e) {
                var $bod = $('body');
                if ($bod.hasClass('menu-visible')) {
                    menu(e);
                }
            });
            $('#menu .main-nav li.top.subs > a').on('touchstart click', function() {
                var theClass = $(this).attr('id');
                if($(this).parent().hasClass('dropped')) {
                    $('li.top').removeClass('dropped');
                    $('ul.nav-drop').hide(300);
                } else {
                    $('li.top').removeClass('dropped');
                    $('ul.nav-drop').hide(300);
                    $(this).parent().addClass('dropped');
                    $('ul.nav-drop.' + theClass).show(300);
                }
                return false;
            });
        });
        function menu(e) {
            e.preventDefault();

            var $body = $( 'body' ),
                $page = $( '#page' ),
                $menu = $( '#menu' ),
                transitionEnd = 'transitionend webkitTransitionEnd otransitionend MSTransitionEnd';

            $body.addClass( 'animating' );

            if ( $body.hasClass( 'menu-visible' ) ) {
                $body.addClass( 'right' );
            } else {
                $body.addClass( 'left' );
            }

            $page.on( transitionEnd, function() {
                $body.removeClass( 'animating right left' ).toggleClass( 'menu-visible' );
                $page.off( transitionEnd );
            });
            e.stopPropagation();
        };
    </script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="./joyent_files/prettify.css">    <script src="./joyent_files/xrt3gzo.js"></script>    <style type="text/css">.tk-din-condensed-web{font-family:"din-condensed-web",sans-serif;}.tk-open-sans{font-family:"open-sans",sans-serif;}.tk-source-code-pro{font-family:"source-code-pro",sans-serif;}</style><link rel="stylesheet" href="./joyent_files/l" media="all"><script>try{Typekit.load({ async: true });}catch(e){}</script>

<div class="container">
    <div class="row top">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12">
            <h1 class="visible-xs">Cloud Pricing</h1>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="container">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 pricing-tabs">
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing" class="active">Compute</a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/images" class="">Image</a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/manta" class="">Manta <span class="hidden-xs">Service</span></a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/bandwidth" class="">Bandwidth</a>
            <a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing/support-tiers" class="">Support</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="container">
    <div class="row chart">
    <div class="col-sm-2 column tabs">
        <input id="monthly" type="checkbox" name="monthly"><label for="monthly" id="monthlylabel">Show Monthly Prices</label>
        <ul class="os switch clearfix" id="pricingtabs">
            <li class="dockercontainer"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing#smartos" data-toggle="tab" aria-expanded="false">Docker Container</a></li>
            <li class="infrastructurecontainer"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing#smartos" data-toggle="tab">Infrastructure Container</a></li>
            <li class="hardwarevm active"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing#kvm" data-toggle="tab" aria-expanded="true">Hardware VM</a></li>
        </ul>
        <ul class="filter switch" style="">
            <li class="l active"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing">Linux</a></li>
            <li class="f"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing">FreeBSD</a></li>
            <li class="ws"><a href="https://www.joyent.com/pricing">Windows</a></li>
        </ul>
        <p class="infrastructure info" style="display: none;">Run your choice of container-native Linux, including certified Ubuntu, Centos, Debian and Alpine Linux, or SmartOS.</p><p class="infrastructure info" style="display: none;">Infrastructure containers support live resizing, CPU-bursting, and run on bare metal for best performance.</p>
        <p class="docker info" style="display: none;">Docker containers support live resizing, CPU bursting and run on bare metal for best performance.</p><p class="docker info" style="display: none;">Run your choice of Docker images from public and private registries.</p>
        <p class="vm info" style="">Support for Windows, FreeBSD, and other non-container-native operating systems.</p><p class="vm info" style="">Hardware VMs are offered for broad compatibility, but don’t support the bare metal performance or other features of our container offerings.</p>
        <p class="info docker vm infrastructure" style="display: block;"><strong>Billing is per minute, but prices are listed per hour for ease of comparison.</strong></p>
    </div>
    <div class="col-sm-10">
    <div class="tab-content">
            <div class="tab-pane" id="smartos">

                        </div>
                        <div class="right">
                            <ul>
                                <li class="spec ram" data-spec="ram">31.75<span>GiB</span></li>
                                <li class="spec cpu" data-spec="cpu">8<span>vCPU</span></li>
                                <li class="spec disk" data-spec="disk">400<span>GB</span></li>
                                <li class="spec api" data-spec="api">k4-general-kvm-31.75G</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        </a>
                        </div>
                                        </div>
                                                                        <div class="col-sm-3 column">

<div class="container">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12">
            <p class="fineprint"><strong>Don't find what you are looking for?</strong> Custom, dedicated and higher resource instance types are available. Contact sales at +1 855 4 JOYENT or <a href="mailto:sales@joyent.com">sales@joyent.com</a> for more information.</p>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function() {
        if($.cookie('monthly') == 'yes') {
            $('#monthly').prop('checked', true);
            $('.pph').hide();
            $('.pph.s.m').show();
        }
        $('#pricingtabs a:first').tab('show'); // Select first tab
        $('p.info.docker').show(); // Select info for first tab
        $('#pricingtabs a').click(function() {
            $('li.lb').removeClass('active');
            $('.filter.switch').hide();
            if (document.getElementById('monthly').checked) {
                $('.pph').hide();
                $('.pph.s.m').show();
            } else {
                $('.pph.s').show();
                $('.pph.s.m').hide();
            }
            $('p.info').hide();
        });
        $('#monthly').click(function() {
            if (this.checked) {
                $('.pph').hide();
                $('.pph.s.m').show();
                $.cookie('monthly', 'yes', { path: '/', expires: 100 });
            } else {
                $('.pph.s').show();
                $('.pph.s.m').hide();
                $.cookie('monthly', 'no', { path: '/', expires: 100 });
            }
        });
        $('#pricingtabs li.hardwarevm').click(function() {
            $('.filter.switch').show();
            $('p.info.vm').show();
            $('.filter.switch li').removeClass('active');
            $('.filter.switch li.l').addClass('active');
            $('.pph, .mpph').hide();
            $('.mpph.s').show();
            if (document.getElementById('monthly').checked) {
                $('.pph.s.m').show();
            } else {
                $('.pph.s').show();
                $('.pph.s.m').hide();
            }
        });
        $('#pricingtabs li.dockercontainer').click(function() {
            $('p.info.docker').show();
        });
        $('#pricingtabs li.infrastructurecontainer').click(function() {
            $('p.info.infrastructure').show();
        });
        $('.filter.switch li.ws a').click(function() {
            $('.filter.switch li').removeClass('active');
            $('.filter.switch li.ws').addClass('active');
            $('.pph, .mpph').hide();
            $('.mpph.ws').show();
            if (document.getElementById('monthly').checked) {
                $('.pph').hide();
                $('.pph.ws.m').show();
            } else {
                $('.pph.ws').show();
                $('.pph.ws.m').hide();
            }
            return false;
        });
        $('.filter.switch li.l a').click(function() {
            $('.filter.switch li').removeClass('active');
            $('.filter.switch li.l').addClass('active');
            $('.pph, .mpph').hide();
            $('.mpph.s').show();
            if (document.getElementById('monthly').checked) {
                $('.pph.s.m').show();
            } else {
                $('.pph.s').show();
                $('.pph.s.m').hide();
            }
            return false;
        });
        $('.filter.switch li.f a').click(function() {
            $('.filter.switch li').removeClass('active');
            $('.filter.switch li.f').addClass('active');
            $('.pph, .mpph').hide();
            $('.mpph.s').show();
            if (document.getElementById('monthly').checked) {
                $('.pph.s.m').show();
            } else {
                $('.pph.s').show();
                $('.pph.s.m').hide();
            }
            return false;
        });
        $('.spec.ram, .spec.cpu, .spec.disk').hover(
            function() {
                var spec = $(this).attr('data-spec');
                $('.spec.' + spec).addClass('strong');
                $('.spec').not('.' + spec).addClass('faint');
            },
            function() {
                $('.spec').removeClass('strong faint');
            }
        );
        $('.wrap').click(function() { $('.cat-info').popover('hide'); });
        $('.cat-info').click(function(event) {
            $('.cat-info').popover('hide');
            event.stopPropagation();
            return false;
        });
        $('.cat-info.triton–standard').popover(
            {
                title : 'Triton Standard Instance',
                content : 'Container-native instances, designed to run Linux and SmartOS on bare metal for best performance.  Triton Standard instances support live re-sizing and up to 4x CPU bursting.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.standard').popover(
            {
                title : 'Standard Instance',
                content : "Hardware virtual machine instances (KVM), designed to run Windows, FreeBSD, and other non-container-native operating systems.  Standard instances are offered for broad compatibility, but don't support the bare metal performance or other features of our container-native instance types.",
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.highio').popover(
            {
                title : 'High I/O Instance',
                content : 'For the most performance-sensitive data applications.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.highcpu').popover(
            {
                title : 'High CPU Instance',
                content : 'For computationally intensive jobs like simulations.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.highmemory').popover(
            {
                title : 'High Memory Instance',
                content : 'For latency-sensitive, in-memory applications.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.generalpurpose').popover(
            {
                title : 'General Purpose Instance',
                content : 'Balanced CPU and memory performance.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.computeoptimized').popover(
            {
                title : 'Compute Optimized Instance',
                content : 'Designed for running compute-intensive applications.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.memoryoptimized').popover(
            {
                title : 'Memory Optimized Instance',
                content : 'Large memory sizes for high throughput applications.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
        $('.cat-info.storageoptimized').popover(
            {
                title : 'Storage Optimized Instance',
                    content : 'Fast Disk instance types are SSD backed and provide the highest I/O performance. Big Disk instance types provide low cost, HDD-based instance storage.',
                placement : 'bottom',
                template: '<div class="popover pricing-popover"><div class="arrow"></div><div class="popover-inner"><h3 class="popover-title"></h3><div class="popover-content"><p></p></div></div></div>',
                trigger : "click"
            }
        );
    });
</script>
    <script src="./joyent_files/combined.js"></script>
<footer class="footer" id="footer">
    <div class="container hidden-print">
        <div class="foot-logo row">
            <div class="col-sm-12">
                <p><img src="./joyent_files/foot-logo.svg" class="svg"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-8">
                <p class="tag">Joyent delivers container-native infrastructure, offering organizations high-performance, yet simple public cloud and private cloud software solutions for today’s demanding real-time web and mobile applications.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1">
                <p>Connect with Joyent</p>

<!-- ADROLL TRACKER 01.07.13 -->
<script type="text/javascript">
adroll_adv_id = "XMBT7QVU7VE43OJHLZFLDN";
adroll_pix_id = "UIYXMPBF5JG6NNOCCYY34U";
(function () {
var oldonload = window.onload;
window.onload = function(){
   __adroll_loaded=true;
   var scr = document.createElement("script");
   var host = "//s.adroll.com";
   scr.setAttribute('async', 'true');
   scr.type = "text/javascript";
   scr.src = host + "/j/roundtrip.js";
   ((document.getElementsByTagName('head') || [null])[0] ||
    document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0].parentNode).appendChild(scr);
   if(oldonload){oldonload()}};
}());
</script>
<!-- End ADROLL TRACKER -->

<!-- Marketo Munchkin -->

<script type="text/javascript">try { mktoMunchkin("993-RJQ-253"); } catch(err) { }</script>
<!-- End Marketo Munchkin -->

    fs = b.getElementsByTagName(a)[0]; t.async=1; t.id=e;
    t.src=('https:'==document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + s;
    fs.parentNode.insertBefore(t, fs); })

                MktoForms2.loadForm("//app-sjf.marketo.com", "993-RJQ-253", 1244, function(form){
                    form.onSuccess(function(values, followUpUrl){
                      //get the form's jQuery element and hide it
                      form.getFormElem().hide();
                      //return false to prevent the submission handler from taking the lead to the follow up url.
                      $('.thankyou').show();
                      return false;
                    });
